item.name: 7 Wonders
item.comment: Good game with cool and fast mechanic. There is no enough interaction between players...

item.name: 7 Wonders: Cities
item.comment: Good expansion.I really like black cards effects.

item.name: 7 Wonders: Leaders
item.comment: Great expansion which adds much more strategy and complexity.

item.name: Abyss
item.comment: Beautiful set collection game with enough interaction between players and interesting choices which offers high replayability.

item.name: Alhambra: Big Box
item.comment: Amazing game with so many variations!It offers very big replay value.A must-have for every Alhambra fan.

item.name: Alias
item.comment: Fun to play,fun to listen,fast turns...Nice concept for party game.

item.name: Aranyásók
item.comment: Nice party game. with expansion=10 (yes, it's really much better game with random role distribution)

item.name: Aranyásók 2
item.comment: This is one of the best expansions I've seen. Base game is great (rating 8), but it's too simple, predictive and frustrating when you have bad hand. Now, every problem is fixed and gameplay is improved so I don't want to play without expansion anymore. Also, now is much more interesting to play games with 3-4 players because of the random role selection.

item.name: Arcana
item.comment: I'm not sure if I don't like deck building games or I just don't like this game.

item.name: Ascension: Deckbuilding Game
item.comment: Very simple and fun mechanic.

item.name: BANG!
item.comment: Awesome party game.One of my favorites.

item.name: Basilica
item.comment: Rating based on 1 play.I like the simple rules and a lot of space for strategy.

item.name: Battlestar Galactica
item.comment: As a huge fan of the tv-series, I really love this game. And I don't like to compare it with Shadows over Camelot because both of them are great (rated 10) in different ways and situations.

item.name: Battlestar Galactica: Pegasus Expansion
item.comment: Still haven't played with New Caprica but I don't like some crucial aspects of the game: execution, Pegasus as a tank for damage and Engine room.

item.name: Belfort
item.comment: Solid area control game but there are many better games than this.

item.name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
item.comment: I really enjoy playing this game but there are some unpredicted and unbalanced situations so I can't rate it higher.

item.name: Black Sheep
item.comment: Simple family game. Why are miniatures so small and box so big?! It's annoying.

item.name: Ca$h 'n Gun$
item.comment: Nice party game.Maybe too chaotic but definitely fun.

item.name: Carcassonne
item.comment: Classic family game for a new millennium.

item.name: Carcassonne: Az elsõ kiegészítõ
item.comment: Simple but interesting

item.name: Castle Panic
item.comment: Game for kids and families.Very easy to win...

item.name: Chaos in the Old World
item.comment: I will probably increase my rating after second play.

item.name: Citadels
item.comment: Rating varies between 5 and 7 because this game can be very frustrating and slooooooooow,especially with new players.5 players is maximum for my taste.

item.name: City Tycoon
item.comment: Nice game with simple rules which punishes bad choices.It's not complicated but you have to analyze everything and plan 3 steps ahead and that is hard when there are TOO MUCH colorful tiles in front of you.

item.name: Clue
item.comment: Before it was funny to play but now I realise that this game is too light and luck dependent for my taste.

item.name: Coloretto
item.comment: Great filler.Easy to learn,pretty addictive.Not so great with 5 players because it's impossible to block colors for everyone.

item.name: Container
item.comment: Great economic game.It's not too complicated and there are many ways to achieve victory.It's very interactive and strategic.

item.name: Cosmic Encounter
item.comment: The best Cosmic Encounter with a great new types of cards and many species.Even without expansions,this is amazing game with high replay-value.

item.name: Cosmic Encounter
item.comment: Although inferior to FFG edition,it captures the Cosmic Encounter spirit and gives you the best artwork and miniatures.20 species is enough for a 50 plays or more, trust me.

item.name: Dancing Dice
item.comment: Very simple but FUN filler. Don't be scared of the theme.

item.name: DC Comics Deck-Building Game
item.comment: na na na na na na na na *SMASH* Superman is the best. :)

item.name: DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Crisis Expansion (Pack 1)
DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Crisis Expansion Pack 2
DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Crossover Pack 2 – Arrow
DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Heroes Unite
Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game
Diamonds
item.comment: Gencan't 2015 prize

item.name: Dixit
item.comment: Beautiful game that everyone will love.If you want to buy a board game as a gift,you can't miss with this.

item.name: Dixit Odyssey
item.comment: Everything in the box EXCEPT cards is great. I don't like new art in comparison to Dixit and Dixit 2.

item.name: Domaine
item.comment: Very strategic and interactive game which is easy to learn.

item.name: Drako
item.comment: Nicely balanced light filler which offers some hard choices to be made during the game.Cool miniatures and artwork,too.

item.name: Drakon (third edition)
item.comment: Easy and fun game with any number of players although I haven't played with 6,yet.

item.name: DungeonQuest (third edition)
item.comment: Completely random with no interaction between players because most of them are going to die before sunrise and treasure count.Monster fights could have been solved in a better way.

item.name: Elder Sign
item.comment: with Unseen Forces=8 With Gates of Arkham=10 (yes, it's really that amazing)

item.name: Elder Sign: Gates of Arkham
item.comment:
Elder Sign 2.0 = everything that I wanted from base game and more (harder, less information on adventures, better mythos deck, membership cards...)
Base game is rated 7.

item.name: Elder Sign: Unseen Forces
item.comment: Great expansion which is the best fix for easy base game.

item.name: Eleminis
item.comment: It's a game for kids and it doesn't work as a filler for me.But give it a try if you like Uno.

item.name: Eminent Domain
item.comment: Interesting game with SF theme but I don't like it like some other deck builders.

item.name: Endeavor
item.comment: Good game with simple rules and many ways to win.It can be interesting to both hardcore and family players.

item.name: A Fake Artist Goes to New York
FBI
item.comment: Simple filler.It's more interesting (and chaotic) with top card variant.

item.name: Filou: Die Katze im Sack
item.originalname: Felix: The Cat in the Sack

item.name: For Sale
item.comment: Secret Santa 2015 gift

item.name: Forbidden Island
item.comment: Streamlined Pandemic. It's great and challenging, but it's not amazing like Pandemic.

item.name: Fresco
item.comment: Just enough euro for my taste.It's a great family game.

item.name: Galaxy Trucker
item.comment: It's funny and frustrating in the same time.

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)
item.comment: F*** you Lanister and Greyjoy! If you're not playing with them, this is great game.Otherwise it's very frustrating...

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition) – A Feast for Crows
item.comment: The only way I wish to play aGoT. It's faster, less diplomacy and backstabbing, and much less predictable. Also it's much easier to find enough players for the game. P.S. base game is 6.

item.name: The Game: Spiel...so lange du kannst!
Ghost Stories
item.comment: Great theme, beautuful art, amazing gameplay with infinite replayability, plays under 1 hour, has scoring so I can track my results... This is currently my favourite game. I can't wait to get both expansions.

item.name: Ghost Stories: White Moon
item.comment: Maybe to complicated, I have to play more. Base game is rated 10.

item.name: Good Cop Bad Cop: Bombers and Traitors
Grave Robbers From Outer Space
item.comment: Mechanic is terrible but the theme and funny quotes make this game a pretty enjoyable experience.Playing with more than 4 players looks too chaotic and slow because there is a lot of text on cards and you always need to recalculate your defense.

item.name: Hanabi
item.comment: I recommend this game to everyone. It definitely deserves Spiels des jahres 2014. Really unique mechanism and huge replayability.

item.name: Hive
item.comment: Too abstract for my taste.

item.name: Ice Flow
item.comment: Nothing special.It's simple in a bad way.

item.name: Incan Gold
item.comment: Pure push your luck. Really fun game with some epic moments.

item.name: Isle of Skye: From Chieftain to King
Jungle Speed
item.comment: The best dexterity game! And top 5 party game.

item.name: Jungle Speed The Expansion
item.comment: It definitely deserves the title "extreme".

item.name: Junta: Viva el Presidente!
item.comment: I've expected little more from this game.But it's good party game,especially with expert rules.

item.name: Keyflower
item.comment: Very simplistic and interactive game with bidding. Great mixture!

item.name: King Me!
item.comment: Great game which works as a filler,family game and game for future board game players.Although very simple and luck dependent,there is some fun bluffing.

item.name: King of Tokyo
item.comment: with Power Up! = 8

item.name: King of Tokyo: Power Up!
item.comment: This expansion should have been in the base game. It's simple, but evolution cards really make a difference because there are multiple winning strategies. And Pandokai is awesome, everyone want to play with him. P.S. base game is rated 7.

item.name: Kingdom Builder
item.comment: Good game (which didn't deserve Spiel des Jahres 2012) with easy rules and high replay-value.

item.name: Kingsburg
item.comment: Great dice game. There is no bad roll,just good, better and the best. :)

item.name: Last Night on Earth: Growing Hunger
Last Night on Earth: The Zombie Game
item.comment: I love zombie theme so this game rocks for me.Atmosphere is intense,every move can be your last if gods of dice doesn't like you and there is a team-play aspect.Give it a try EVEN if you don't like zombies just to see how mechanic of the game works perfectly.

item.name: Last Will
item.comment: This game is amazing.It has simple rules,unique theme,nice mechanic,great balance for 2-5 players and plays within 1 hour.Also there are many choices and ways to achieve bankruptcy.

item.name: Legendary Encounters: An Alien Deck Building Game
item.comment: I've played only coop mode but the whole package looks amazing! Especially traitor and alien player aspects of it. I'll probably rate it higher when I try all modes. The game is very thematic and fun to play. It's definitely improved version of Marvel Legendary and I would recommend it to anyone.

item.name: Legendary: A Marvel Deck Building Game
Letters from Whitechapel
item.comment: Amazing game both as Jack and detectives. I really love hidden movement and deduction. For now, Jack is unbeatable with all detective variants included (except teritorial arrest) but every game is still interesting for both sides. It's really great that designers included many variants for both sides so you can tweak your game depending on experience of the group.

item.name: Lord of the Rings: Friends & Foes
Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation
Lords of Waterdeep
item.comment: Getaway worker placement game which will work for everyone and it is good with any number of players.

item.name: Lords of Xidit
item.comment: "Secret Santa 2014 gift" Beautiful, simple but engaging game with cool winning conditions. It's different and I really love it.

item.name: Lupus in Tabula
item.comment: I have played with only 10 friends but it was fun.There are many roles that we couldn't use.:( The biggest minus is that you need really big group for play.

item.name: Manhattan
item.comment: Very fun gateway game,even without Godzilla variant.With experienced players,this game becomes very strategic.

item.name: Mega Civilization
item.comment:
This rating is based on one play with 12 players with some major rules overlooked. But we all enjoyed in this epic game so we are definitely going to repeat it sometime soon. If you are in Zagreb, contact us so we could gahter even more players for next game (probably on 16. or 23.1.2016.)
https://www.facebook.com/events/605036119647575/
My thoughts about the game? Well, it's amazing but very exhausting. Trading is really huge part of the gameplay, and very fun one. Advance cards are cool, but it takes really long to get the highest tier. Rulebook could have been written better but after one play you should catch everything without a problem.

item.name: Mondo
item.comment: Great family game.It's fast and challenging.There are some modifiers for difficulty,too.

item.name: Monty Python Fluxx
item.comment: Why would anyone want to play this game?!

item.name: Munchkin
item.comment: Too long,random, with too much text on cards,and kingmaking in the end is anticlimactic.

item.name: Munchkin Cthulhu
item.comment: It's 4 just because of the theme.

item.name: Neuroshima Hex!
item.comment: You will need some time to learn every unit ability but it's worth it.

item.name: Nincs kegyelem!
item.comment: This is a little gem. So simple rules, but so tense gameplay. It works with any type of gamer/non-gamer.

item.name: Nodwick: The Card Game
item.comment: Complete chaos!

item.name: Once Upon a Time: The Storytelling Card Game
Pandemic
item.comment: One of my favorite games.Simple game with amazing mechanic,balanced difficulty and it's cooperative!I could play it everyday.

item.name: Pandemic: On the Brink
item.comment: Amazing addition which gives so many little things in the game and boosts the base game so much!It has a big replay value and provides more difficulty levels.

item.name: Panic Station
item.comment: I recommend this game to everyone.Paranoia makes it so fun!

item.name: Panic Station: Survival Kit Mini Expansion
item.comment: Rated as the base game. Antidote card is the best addition to the game. Heavy grenade is maybe too powerful. Rest of the cards are ok.

item.name: Pay Dirt
item.comment:
http://boardgamegeek.com/thread/1150845/crash-games-pay-dirt-contest-winners/page/1
Patrick claimed that he has sent my reward multiple times without any proof. And I'm not the only one. Coligil and frle (from another Crash Games contest) also didn't receive their prizes. So this is my rating for Patrick, custome service and Crash Games in general. Is it our fault that we are international winners?

item.name: Pictionary
item.comment: Nice party game for everyone who knows to draw fast and precise.I will add +1 rating when I finally win.

item.name: PitchCar
item.comment: It's not interesting to me.

item.name: Pokémon Trading Card Game
item.comment: Classic for my generation.It's a shame that most of the people just collected card instead of playing with them.For a TCG,it's pretty balanced (from perspective of a player who didn't buy new edition cards for last 8 years).

item.name: Power Grid
item.comment: I understand why this game holds in top10 on BGG. :)

item.name: Quarto!
item.comment: Better than chess!

item.name: Race! Formula 90: Expansion #1 – RF90 Series Championship
The Resistance
item.comment: Unique game which you can only love or hate.It can be very fun and very frustrating in the same time.There is also a problem with balance when playing with smaller groups.

item.name: The Resistance: Avalon
item.comment: For me, this is far superior version of Resistance. Merlin and Assassin mechanic is incredible solution, much better than Plot cards. Also, other special loyalty cards allow you to tweak the balance so the game works perfectly in any number of players. And last, the theme is better. P.S. Resistance is rated 7 (after 40+ plays).

item.name: Rex: Final Days of an Empire
item.comment: Asymmetrical powers, bidding for cards, alliances with combo powers that prevent backstabbing, nice battle system, battles in every round... Every game is a different experience, usually depending on number of players. Games with 6 players are the best BUT they can last for 4 hours and that is the main reason why I don't play it often. And some people really hate this game because it's not well balanced so you need to find right group for the best experience.

item.name: Risk
item.comment: Game of my childhood.It needs some house rules to become fun to play.Duration and luck factor are still a problem.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
RoboRally
item.comment: I'm terrible in this game but i like it.I wonder how would look like 8-players game...

item.name: Rune Age
item.comment: I don't need 500 cards to be happy with deck builder game if it's great. And this game is great.Can't wait to play with every races and all scenarios. BTW. coop is brutal.

item.name: Saint Malo
item.comment: Easy to learn and play,with cool drawing board,and with less frustrations than some other dice games because you can always do something with the final result.Play with three players for best experience.

item.name: Samurai Spirit
item.comment: The weakest game from Antoine Bauza. Some random moments completely ruin the game. But I like it for what it is, a simple short coop game for 3-7 players with some cool combos.

item.name: Scotland Yard
item.comment: Classic which still resists time.It's simple deduction game that is interesting for both detectives and Mister X.I haven't played with 6 players yet but probably it's very hard for Mister X to win if detectives know their job.

item.name: Scrabble
item.comment: Classic with infinite replay value.

item.name: Sentinels of the Multiverse
item.comment: It's a solid game, although I'm not impressed with this kind of coop...

item.name: SET
item.comment: Game for fast thinkers. Solo mode is also cool because you can enjoy without the time pressure.

item.name: Shadow Hunters
item.comment: You can play this game with 8 players and finish in less then 1 hour! I don't like to compare this with Bang! because both of them are great.

item.name: Shadows over Camelot
item.comment: It's a simple game with beautiful components. It's little too easy for loyal knights to win, and traitor doesn't have a lot of options for sabotage so expansion is essential for long term replayability. I don't like to compare it with Battlestar Galactica because both of them are great games for different situations and mood.

item.name: Shadows over Camelot: Merlin's Company
item.comment: Must-have expansion,although a bit pricey for what it offers. Everything inside is great and I really don't want to play SoC without it anymore.The game is much harder now,and that makes me very happy.

item.name: Sheriff of Nottingham
item.comment: If you don't like metagaming and you are highly analitic player, just skip this game. It's a fun family game.

item.name: Slavika
item.comment: This game suffers from constant AP and slow pace.Don't try to play if you are not ready to spend 2 hours (and that will happen a lot).

item.name: Small World Underground
item.comment: Nice game with high replay value. My problem with this game is lack of direct interaction...

item.name: Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game
item.comment: Very engaging game but one bad roll can ruin the whole game. It's little too hard to win.

item.name: Stone Age
item.comment:
I've played it once and didn't like it at all,especially civilization cards and their role in final scoring.Maybe I'll give it another chance in the future...
EDIT: This game is over-rated.

item.name: Tantrix Gobble
item.comment: Fast and mind-breaking game.

item.name: Tash-Kalar: Arena of Legends
item.comment: I have to try other modes and different number of players...

item.name: Thunderstone Advance: Towers of Ruin
item.comment: It's interesting to balance between deck building and scoring victory points.

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Alvin & Dexter
item.comment: This mini expansion increases my rating for TtR from 6 to 8. Finally there is some interaction between players!

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Europe
item.comment: Simple game with simple rules,great for introducing non-gamers to board game world.

item.name: Turn the Tide
item.comment: Very simple game but also very addictive and fun with any number of players.There is a nice balance between strategy and luck.

item.name: Ugg-Tect
item.comment: Funny to watch,not so fun to play.

item.name: Walk to Jesus
item.comment: This game is only for nongamers. Theme is decently incorporated into the game.

item.name: The Walking Dead: The Board Game
WarCraft: The Board Game
item.comment: My first real board game.I bought it because of Warcraft theme.I don't like the mechanic of game.

item.name: Warhammer Quest: The Adventure Card Game
World of Warcraft Miniatures Game
item.comment: I have expected more from this game...

item.name: Yggdrasil Second Edition with Asgard Expansion
item.comment: This is going OOP?! What a shame! It's amazing coop game. I thought that it will have too much random elements (dice, bags, cards) but it hits a sweet spot for me. Trance and new characters fix high player number games, and there are angry enemies and ragnarok cards to tweak difficulty. It's a unique game that every experienced coop lover should at least try, if not have in collection.

item.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game
item.comment: I have played only on computer with first editions cards.Good game,not more,not less.

item.name: Zombies!!!
item.comment: Although I like this game,it can be very very frustrating and that is never good for the board game.
